ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would recommend GBL 780. It was an accessible course on finance.
I would definitely recommend GLBL 780. Although it covers a very short (and recent) period of time, it goes very in depth, which allowed me to broaden my understanding on the topic.
A great overview of the crisis that still manages to go a little more in depth in a few areas.
Would recommend. Good overview of what happened during the crisis and provides a different perspective on the events and warning signs to look towards going forward.
I would recommend. It gives a good overview of the major events that led to and followed the crisis in the US and Europe.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: I would like to work for a global company in the near future and having basic knowledge about global financial system from this class is helpful.
